description.S1: You got Anton's diet toothpaste research data.
description.S2: Head to Roseway and speak with him.

blurb.B1: If you return to Anton Crane after resolving the lab peacefully,
blurb.B2: he and Porter will be arguing about it.
blurb.B3: You can give him the research data for massive Auntie Cleo Reputation Up, 3755 Bit Cartridge, 23000xp and Researcher's Scrubs.
blurb.B4: He will further reward you with Auntie Cleo reputation if you didn't kill the Raptidons.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: That no account fool Porter and his crew are even more worthless than I could've imagined. They've abandoned their posts! This is madness!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I convinced the outlaws that staying would be hazardous to their health.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: My research? Please tell me you've recovered it.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's... you can't possibly understand the enormity of what you've done for me.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Excellent. If we're done here, I'd like to get back to work. You understand.

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's all manner of distressing. There truly is nothing left for me...

dialog.speaker: Anton (Male)
dialog.utterance: Keeping it? But why? Do you expect there is a black market for toothpaste formulae?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm sure I can find someone who will pay for it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No reason, just want to mess with you.
